changeSet.author: kfs
changeSet.createView: (select pur_po_itm_t.FDOC_NBR AS FDOC_NBR, sum((case when ((pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ACTV_IND = 'Y') and isnull(pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ORD_QTY)) then pur_po_itm_t.ITM_UNIT_PRC when ((pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ACTV_IND = 'Y') and (pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ORD_QTY is not null)) then (pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ORD_QTY * pur_po_itm_t.ITM_UNIT_PRC) when (isnull(pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ACTV_IND) and isnull(pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ORD_QTY)) then pur_po_itm_t.ITM_UNIT_PRC when (isnull(pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ACTV_IND) and (pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ORD_QTY is not null)) then (pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ORD_QTY * pur_po_itm_t.ITM_UNIT_PRC) when (pur_po_itm_t.ITM_ACTV_IND = 'N') then 0 else 0 end)) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT from pur_po_itm_t group by pur_po_itm_t.FDOC_NBR)

changeSet.author: kfs
changeSet.createView: (SELECT FDOC_NBR, SUM(CASE WHEN ITM_ACTV_IND = 'Y' AND ITM_ORD_QTY IS NULL THEN ITM_UNIT_PRC WHEN ITM_ACTV_IND = 'Y' AND ITM_ORD_QTY IS NOT NULL THEN ITM_ORD_QTY * ITM_UNIT_PRC WHEN ITM_ACTV_IND IS NULL AND ITM_ORD_QTY IS NULL THEN ITM_UNIT_PRC WHEN ITM_ACTV_IND IS NULL AND ITM_ORD_QTY IS NOT NULL THEN ITM_ORD_QTY * ITM_UNIT_PRC WHEN ITM_ACTV_IND ='N' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM PUR_PO_ITM_T GROUP BY FDOC_NBR)

changeSet.author: kfs
changeSet.createView: (select A.FDOC_NBR AS FDOC_NBR, sum(A.ITM_OSTND_ENC_AMT) AS TOTAL_ENCUMBRANCE from pur_po_itm_t A group by A.FDOC_NBR)

changeSet.author: kfs
changeSet.createView: select P.AP_PUR_DOC_LNK_ID AS AP_PUR_DOC_LNK_ID, P.PO_ID AS PO_ID, P.PO_CUR_IND AS PO_CUR_IND, P.FDOC_NBR AS FDOC_NBR, P.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID, P.RECUR_PMT_TYP_CD AS RECUR_PMT_TYP_CD, P.PO_VNDR_CHC_CD AS PO_VNDR_CHC_CD, P.PO_END_DT AS PO_END_DT, e.TOTAL_ENCUMBRANCE AS TOTAL_ENCUMBRANCE, summation.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_AMOUNT from pur_po_t P join pur_po_itm_tot_enc_v E join pur_po_itm_tot_amt_v SUMMATION where ((P.FDOC_NBR = e.FDOC_NBR) and (P.FDOC_NBR = summation.FDOC_NBR))

changeSet.author: kfs
changeSet.createView: SELECT P.AP_PUR_DOC_LNK_ID, P.PO_ID, P.PO_CUR_IND, P.FDOC_NBR, P.OBJ_ID, P.RECUR_PMT_TYP_CD, P.PO_VNDR_CHC_CD, P.PO_END_DT, E.TOTAL_ENCUMBRANCE, SUMMATION.TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM PUR_PO_T P,PUR_PO_ITM_TOT_ENC_V E,PUR_PO_ITM_TOT_AMT_V SUMMATION WHERE P.FDOC_NBR = E.FDOC_NBR AND P.FDOC_NBR = SUMMATION.FDOC_NBR
